label: ⚠️ Poor Labor Practices
definition: Company has documented patterns of labor practices that violate workers' rights or fall significantly below industry standards.

criteria.description: Significant OSHA violations within past 5 years
criteria.threshold: >3 serious violations OR any willful violations

criteria.description: Documented wage theft affecting substantial number of workers
Workplace injury rates significantly above industry average
Credible reports of unsafe working conditions from workers or investigations

counterCriteria: Issues fully remediated with third-party verification
Significant improvements in safety metrics over 3+ years
